scripts.db: sequelize-cli db:drop && sequelize-cli db:create && sequelize-cli db:migrate && sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.cluster: pm2 start src/server.js -i 2 --name my-bot && pm2 logs my-bot
scripts.db:setup: NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize db:create && NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize db:migrate && NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.seed: NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize db:seed:undo:all && NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize db:seed:all
